spell.mins_spellbooks.fatten.guide: make target thick (shift cast for shrink(?) back)
spell.mins_spellbooks.spinning.guide: spin your self and deal damage to nearby entities
spell.mins_spellbooks.bouncing_laser.gui: shoot a laser that bounce off walls, each bounce increase damage of laser
spell.mins_spellbooks.morph.guide: turn your self to targeted mob (shift cast for return to player)
